ABOUTME.NAME: Why me?
ABOUTME.DESCRIPTION: I'm a passionate frontend developer focused on user-friendly, responsive web applications. With a love for modern technologies and video games, I constantly expand my skills.

SKILLS.TITLE: My Skills
SKILLS.LEARNINGNEXT: I love discovering new technologies, developing solutions and constantly evolving - that's what makes this job exciting for me.

DESCRIPTIONONE.HEADLINE: About this project
DESCRIPTIONONE.TEXT: Join is a web-based Kanban team board that I developed together with my group. It enables the visual organization of tasks, the setting of priorities and efficient team collaboration - inspired by tools such as Trello.

DESCRIPTIONTWO.HEADLINE: How I organized my workflow
DESCRIPTIONTWO.TEXT: I have divided my tasks into clear sub-areas: Planning, implementation and testing. With the help of Kanban lists, branch workflows and regular code reviews, I was able to work in a structured and focused way - even in stressful phases.

DESCRIPTIONTHREE.HEADLINE: New experience through Angular
DESCRIPTIONTHREE.TEXT: Working in a team was very rewarding. I learned to take responsibility, maintain clear communication and react flexibly to challenges. The mutual exchange was particularly important - both technically and organizationally.

DESCRIPTIONONE.HEADLINE: About this project
DESCRIPTIONONE.TEXT: This game application was created using HTML5 Canvas and Vanilla JavaScript, with a strong focus on the technical implementation of animations and precise game mechanics.

DESCRIPTIONTWO.HEADLINE: How I organized my workflow
DESCRIPTIONTWO.TEXT: My 2D game built with HTML5 Canvas and Vanilla JavaScript offers a dynamic gameplay experience with exciting boss fights, detailed animations, and a well-thought-out level design.

DESCRIPTIONTHREE.HEADLINE: My experience with teamwork
DESCRIPTIONTHREE.TEXT: Through this project, I gained valuable experience and discovered the many possibilities JavaScript, HTML, and CSS offer in modern web development.

DESCRIPTIONONE.HEADLINE: About this project
DESCRIPTIONONE.TEXT: We are currently working flat out on our new project. Stay tuned - it's worth it!

DESCRIPTIONTWO.HEADLINE: How I organized my workflow
DESCRIPTIONTWO.TEXT: Subscribe to our newsletter to make sure you don't miss the launch.

DESCRIPTIONTHREE.HEADLINE: My experience with teamwork
DESCRIPTIONTHREE.TEXT: Thank you for your patience and interest.

DESCRIPTIONONE.HEADLINE: About this project
DESCRIPTIONONE.TEXT: We are fine-tuning the final details so that we can soon offer you a great experience.

DESCRIPTIONTWO.HEADLINE: How I organized my workflow
DESCRIPTIONTWO.TEXT: Check back soon or subscribe to our newsletter to stay up to date.

DESCRIPTIONTHREE.HEADLINE: My experience with teamwork
DESCRIPTIONTHREE.TEXT: We look forward to welcoming you soon!

CONTACT.TITLE: Contact
CONTACT.DESCRIPTION: I am looking forward to actively helping to shape exciting projects. Feel free to contact me if you are looking for dedicated support in web development or innovative ideas!

PRIVACY.TITLE: Legal Notes
PRIVACY.DATA_COLLECTION_TEXT_1: No personal data is automatically stored or analyzed when visiting this website. No cookies or tracking are used.
PRIVACY.CONTACT_FORM_TEXT_1: When contacting me via the contact form, the data you provide (e.g. name, email, message) will only be used to process your request.
PRIVACY.CONTACT_FORM_TEXT_2: Processing is based on your consent (Art. 6 para. 1 lit. a GDPR).
PRIVACY.CONTACT_FORM_TEXT_3: The data will not be passed on to third parties and will be deleted after your request has been completed.
PRIVACY.LOG_FILES_TEXT_1: The web server automatically stores technical data for each request:
PRIVACY.LOG_FILES_TEXT_2: These logs are used for error analysis only and are not linked to other data. No personal evaluation takes place.
PRIVACY.RIGHTS_INTRO: You have the following rights under the GDPR:
PRIVACY.RIGHTS_ACCESS: Access to your stored data (Art. 15 GDPR)
PRIVACY.RIGHTS_CONTACT: To exercise your rights, please contact:
PRIVACY.REVOCATION_TEXT: You can revoke your consent at any time by emailing
PRIVACY.SECURITY_TEXT: This website uses HTTPS encryption. Your data is securely transmitted when submitting the contact form.
PRIVACY.HOSTING_TEXT: The website is hosted on a private server in Germany and is exclusively managed by Florian Irving.
